title: Can i please get an option to not get paired with a duo when i SOLO Q
body:
i would love to climb but everytime i get a duo the game is lost soon as i find out they are duo.
and by surprise they are the ones who do the worst get us all killed feed the hyper carrys or assasins
or make awful plays
Last game i get yasuo mid he goes 0-9 to swain before 20 mins
And his duo went ryze top and lost to an ezreal

Both of them had next to 0 farm both of them where terrible players both of them cost us the game and made our jungler afk.
